ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
What is your overall rating of the primary instructor?
The primary instructor's sensitivity to students and ability to provide students with adequate feedback was:

narratives.question_text: Indicate the total number of hours per week (outside the classroom) you spent on this course:
comments: 2- 5hrs/week
2-3 hours
3 hours

narratives.question_text: Looking back on this course, what is your overall assessment of the course:  What are its strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might it be improved?
comments: An excellent class! Course was just the right amount of class room time as well as the readings assigned were actually useful for those of us looking to add knowledge for our jobs.
Great introduction to industrial hygiene, with very effective guest speakers. The five short papers required are much preferred over written exams.
Great course. Dr Cohen is terrific. Great guest lecturers.
Very useful and practical course. Love the parts where instructor invite those who worked in the field and shared their experience with us.
The information in the course is very applicable to my career. I definitely feel it prepared me well.

I liked the ability to choose the topics on which to write and to be given the material and lecture prior to the writing. I enjoyed the guest speakers and the professor's knowledge of industrial hygiene. He seemed well informed of the latest issues and didn't get mired down in trying to teach everything in one semester. He seemed to hit the most relevant topics.

narratives.question_text: Please evaluate the instructor of this course. What are the instructor's strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might his or her teaching be improved?
comments: Instructor: Howard J. Cohen  The instructor has real life work experience as an industrial hygienist so brings in great guest speakers as well as he himself is an excellent lecturer. At graduate school level, lecturers like Dr. Howard Cohen are what I expected - real life experience, academic background as well as industry reputation, well organized lectures that really add value to the grad school classes.
Instructor: Howard J. Cohen  Howard is very effective at explaining a difficult subject matter. He is readily available to his students and open to constructive feedback.
Instructor: Howard J. Cohen  Terrific
Instructor: Howard J. Cohen  Dr. Cohen was very friendly, insightful and good at teaching.

Instructor: Howard J. Cohen  He was very sensitive to our needs and academic levels. I enjoyed that he didn't bog us down with needless projects and really let us synthesize the information to enhance our understanding of the material.
Instructor: Howard J. Cohen  See above.

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize this course for a fellow student? Would you recommend it to another student? Why or why not?
comments: If you are interested in learning more about occupational health and industrial medicine, this class is most definitely recommended.
A succinct introduction to industrial hygiene.
Topics on occupational medicine and hygiene with industrial context.I took it as an elective and would recommend the course.
I would strongly recommend it to anyone who is interested in Occupational Environmental health.
I would highly recommend this course. It was interesting and really incorporated concepts from all of our environmental classes.
A must for all occ med students. It completed the rest of the picture that the other classes didn't have time to address in detail.
